name: Capital Docks
role_in_state: primary maritime hub and entry port
culture_adjustments: intense guild authority over daily life and justice
higher linguistic diversity; afloat lingua franca with Coastal Tongues core
pragmatic secular merchant norms often override clan customs
work-day rites and shipwright craft-rituals more elaborate
stronger emphasis on mobility and contract kinship among dockworkers
constraints: ritual magic depends on scarce imported reagents and guild-controlled labs
no high-pressure steam industry; heavy craftwork remains manual/low-pressure
navigational auguries supplement but do not replace charts and skilled pilots
notes: principal customs and quarantine point for State_10 imports/exports
guild courts (shipwrights, merchants, pilots) exercise parallel jurisdiction
strategic choke-point: protecting docks is state priority
